action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for better user experience.
notes: Focus on User Appearance settings to customize landing page and inbox.

action_item: Users & Roles - Change the main login password for security.
notes: Use the Change Password option in the settings tab.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update eSignature ID for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the two-step process to validate current ID and set a new one.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update the visual signature in the system.
notes: Validate eSignature ID to access the signature drawing interface.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates for CCDA.
notes: Select and order patient chart sections for clinical summaries.
